titles.title: Environmental reporting of mining companies as part of environmental policy

descriptions.description: IDIMT-2022 Digitalization of society, business and management in a pandemic; 30th Interdisciplinary Information Management Talk / Chroust, Gerhard ; Doucek, Petr ; Oškrdal, Václav, page339-344

This article compares the environmental information mining companies publish on websites as part of their environmental policy. The article compares the disclosure of information by larger companies with smaller ones using different categories. The central aspect of this research was whether mining companies have an established environmental policy and what tools they use to report the information.
